content: **crocheted blanket in drops fiesta the piece is worked in granny squares which are then worked together ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #wildflowerbloomblanket drops design pattern fs-034 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** width approx = 82 cm length approx = 122 cm 1 square measures approx 20 x 20 cm **yarn ** drops fiesta from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 550 g colour 27 winter carnival 200 g colour 01 off white if you want to work the blanket in just one colour you will need 750 g drops fiesta **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
